    • Uses of CouponException in exceptionForCouponSystem

      Methods in exceptionForCouponSystem that throw CouponException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String CouponMessage.cem()
      message thrown in case of CouponException and SQLException in the task
      java.lang.String CouponMessage.iem()
      message thrown in case of InteruptedException in the task

      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)

    • Uses of CouponException in mainProgram

      Methods in mainProgram that throw CouponException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConnectionPool.closeAllConnections()
      this function closes all of the connections. used before shutting down the system.
      java.sql.Connection ConnectionPool.getConnection()
      a synchronized function that enables connection users (DBDAO classes) to get a connection from the pool: (needs to be synchronized so that connections won't get lost between the pool and the users- there is a return function that does the opposite)
      static CouponSystem CouponSystem.getInstance()
      a singleton method creating an instance of the coupon system:
      static ConnectionPool ConnectionPool.getInstance()
      a singleton method creating an instance of the connection-pool:
      Client CouponSystem.Login(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String clientType)
      The function that allows all the clients of the system to enter the system using they're login details:
      void CouponSystem.shutDown()
      the function that shuts down the coupon system: (closes all the connections from the pool and stops the daily expiration remove coupon task)
      Constructors in mainProgram that throw CouponException 
      Constructor and Description
      DailyCouponExpirationTask()
      Constructor (enables to throw the exception on to the main)
